item.title: potato mashup! ðŸ¥”
item.description:
everything related to new porter robinson iâ€™ll love it! ya, i thought that the latest alffyâ€™s single are inspired so much with porterâ€™s style. from the way he took a concept and coloring his hair, i'm pretty sure he is.

tracklist:
alffy rev, little linka - till we meet again (clay machine remix)

everything related to new porter robinson iâ€™ll love it! ya, i thought that the latest alffy's single are inspired so much with porterâ€™s style. from the way he took a concept and coloring his hair, i'm pretty sure he is.
surfaces - sunday best
no way you not love this song, this song heard everywhere. from tiktok selfie to summer jungle beat, cool!
justin bieber - yummy
for favorite, this is an exception. sorry
flume, vera blue - rushing back
flume!!! the ass eater!
madeon - all my friends
aalllll myyy frriiieeends all watching, just why?
tones and i - dance monkey
too catchy to not listen
madeon, kyan - you're on (feat. kyan)
this is the best madeon song ever exsist!
rich brian - 100 degrees
indonesia proud to own rich brian! keep it 100 deg!
weird genius, charita utami - flickshot
first single from trio dj that became viral here in indo.
weird genius, sara fajira - lathi
and this , the most well-done definition of "traditional indonesian edm"
hans zimmer - interstellar gargantua scene
this is the essence of my mashup, all about infinite space!

go check my video here.

ps: i do epic live mashup using ableton's session view and launchpad, enjoy! and i named my first mashup as potato (indonesian: kentang) do you know why? fun fact, here in my country kentang is slang word for rookie people, so ya, forgive my mistake hehe

- k

item.title: rain drops, the painkiller
item.description:
akhirnya aku menyaksikan perjalanan rintik butir kehidupan yang mendarat tepat di tanganku. udara yang memaksa tubuh ini menggigil dan kedinginan sekiranya puas melawan sang kehangatan yang terlebih dahulu berkuasa. tiba tiba, suara itu membuatku takut, membuat semua orang menutup telinga, aku juga ingin melakukannya juga, namun tak ada gunanya, toh aku sudah mendengarnya.

aku mengelak, menyalahkan apa yang aku rasakan, bukan ini yang sedang aku rasakan, ini hanya sementara. mungkin jendela yang penuh dengan butir-butir kehidupan ini yang membuatku seolah tak tahu apa yang sebenarnya sedang kurasakan.

sesungguhnya aku tidak tinggal diam, aku sedang menunggu, menunggu dan mencari, tapi aku tak tahu apa. jujur saja, yang aku bisa hanya mengalihkan perhatian atas apa yang aku resahkan.

- k

item.title: i'm starting a new personal blog
item.description:
good day internet!

started from today, iâ€™m trying to born new ugly blogging website that previously left abandoned.

why left abandoned?

good question boy! i still donâ€™t know the exact reason, but maybe just because iâ€™m too lazy to do things. but, recently i realized that i feel something didnâ€™t work properly, maybe just because i need to share something that i thought bit complicated.

unfortunately, some social media i used still not able to doing this things (eg. sharing code, tutorial, raw graphic design). twitter too short to share a hello world code, but instagram are too good-looking to share a .zip file. i need something in between a to be honest. well, i donâ€™t really know where the ships going to go.

but, the only thing i know isâ€¦ weâ€™re going to move forward, and write something better than yesterday, hope it works. :)

sincerely,
